name: Light Strike
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION
An electrifying challenge that gives your screen the look and feel of an arcade machine! Try as you may to survive this thunderstorm, but it only intensifies as you play. Light Strike makes its debut as the first of many games that will be part of the "One Game a Month" initiative; now available for Windows and Macintosh computers!

CONTROLS
Keyboard
Left Arrow/A: Move Left, Decrease Value
Right Arrow/D: Move Right, Increase Value
Up Arrow/W: Select Above
Down Arrow/S: Select Below
Space: Jump, Confirm, Toggle
Enter/Return: Pause, Submit
Escape: Back, Quit

Controller
Left DPAD/Left Joystick: Move Left, Decrease Value
Right DPAD/Right Joystick: Move Right, Increase Value
Up DPAD/Up Joystick: Select Above
Down DPAD/Down Joystick: Select Below
A: Jump, Confirm, Toggle
Start: Pause, Submit
B: Back, Quit
